name: supergenpass
title: SuperGenPass
description: Tool to generate passwords from master password
author: evilhex

preferences.name: hashRounds
preferences.description: Minimum number of rounds to hash the input
preferences.title: Hash rounds

preferences.name: length
preferences.description: Length of the generated password. Valid lengths are integers between 4 and 24 inclusive. Note that 23- and 24-character MD5-based passwords provide no additional entropy
preferences.title: Length password

preferences.name: method
preferences.description: A string specifying the requested hash function. The only supported string values are 'md5' or 'sha512'
preferences.title: Hashing algorithm

preferences.name: passthrough
preferences.description: A boolean value directing whether or not to use the url as is without validation or changes
preferences.title: Passthrough
preferences.label: Use the url as is without validation or changes

preferences.name: removeSubdomains
preferences.description: A boolean value directing whether or not to remove subdomains from the hostname before generating the password
preferences.title: Remove subdomains
preferences.label: Remove subdomains from the hostname before generating the password

preferences.name: secret
preferences.description: This option is provided for convenience, as the same output can be produced by manually concatenating the master and secret passwords
preferences.title: Secret
preferences.label: A secret password to be appended to the master password before generating the password
